description:
ISO 12647-3 is the graphic technology standard that defines process control procedures for production of half tone color separation and print production. The standard was first published in 1998, revised in 2004 and again in 2013. The 2013 revision made significant change in the standard.

This course aims to provide a complete overview of the quality standard. The course provides all the specifications of ISO 12647-3 from pre-press, materials till press.

The course includes downloadable PDF materials to read, videos of the presentations and interactive QUIZ to test the progress of the participants.

The program is aimed at production, pre-press, materials and quality executives in newspaper industry and also at students of Printing Technology, who are interested to learn print quality management systems.
title: ISO 12647-3. Quality standard for newspaper production
